name: Corrupted Roots
description:
Locky is a fairy that's had enough. 

When seeing the state of their homeland corrupted by the encroaching humans they decide to go back to the roots of their ancestors and defend the nature around them that has been ravaged almost beyond repair, even for a fairy of the woods. 

On the way they realize, things are much worse than first realized.

Kill all the enemies to continue throughout your adventure!

TEAM:

Environmental Art: Ronamis (https://globalgamejam.org/users/ronamis)

Character Art: JSTaskis (https://globalgamejam.org/users/spaceman360)

Programming: thegreatpl (https://globalgamejam.org/users/thegreatpl)

Jamioc (https://globalgamejam.org/users/jamioc)

Sound FX/Ambient: Duncirunci (https://globalgamejam.org/users/duncirunci)

Music: Lucia La Rezza (https://globalgamejam.org/users/thegreatpl)
